tech1.title: Mobile Development
tech1.subtitle: iOS & Android
tech1.description:
I have extensive experience creating solutions on mobile platforms with functionalities such as: push notifications, maps, responsive design and animations.
Go ahead and use my test app!

tech2.title: Frontend Development
tech2.subtitle: Web apps & Progressive Web Apps
tech2.description:
An expert in creating web products with React, I have worked on important projects that require a current and responsive design. The interesting features I have made are: 3D animations, SASS, PWA creation and maps with the Google Maps API.
Do you want to see my e-commerce demo? Just click on it!

tech3.title: Backend Development
tech3.subtitle: Node JS, REST, GraphQL, MongoDB & Firebase
tech3.description:
I have experience in creating projects that require a Rest API or GrapQL with a NO-SQL base like Mongo. Also, I have domain of Firebase in its configuration, databases, analytics, FCM, etc.
Did you know that I love Dragon Ball Z? Yes, I love it so much that I made it an API. Do you dare to try it?

SEO.title: Cristian Ronda | Website
SEO.description: Cristian Ronda is an Information Network Engineer and Ecuadorian developer located in Quito - Ecuador. He specializes in creating web, mobile and server applications. Just as he also dominates the Google Firebase service. Visit his page is spectacular!
